content.rendered:
As always the ICAD’s was a night to remember, celebrating the holiest of holy in Christ Church Cathedral. We are over the moon to be the most awarded agency in ICAD’s 60th year. Credit to our collaborative people as we rang in the evening with bells awarded across a range of categories including radio, experiential, film, art direction and social.

On top of that we saw our Katie Kidd take home the Greenhorn Award and Three won Client of the Year. Divising a plan to ring the bell at next year’s has begun.
